document.full_text: a man with two handguns opened fire at an elementary school in rio de janeiro, killing 11 students and wounding 13 others before turning his guns on himself, the police said.
document.title: gunman opens fire at school in brazil, killing 12 children
lines_and_colors: a man with two handguns opened fire at an elementary school in rio de janeiro, killing 11 students and wounding 13 others before turning his guns on himself, the police said.
